title: ReplyWithHeader Mail Plugin/Bundle's Latest Changelog
description: Most recent changes with release notes and links to updates.

latest.title: v6.1 (1 enhancement, 1 bug fix)
latest.releaseNotes:
v6.1 (1 enhancement, 1 bug fix)
  • Improved options and Date header formatting
  • Added 'Enable debug mode' checkbox option inn the tab 'About'

Please have a look Install-Instructions-Mojave-OS-and-Above.txt and follow the steps for Mojave OS and above.

Spread the word of ReplyWithHeader (RWH).
